body:
Related issues: #6861 #6864 

Looks like the fix we did to make pkg-config work on Crays (see setup_dependent_environment), needs to be applied to pkgconf. It is causing the same issue we had before.

### Expected Result

pkgconf working similar to pkg-config

### Actual Result

Errors shown in the PRs above

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack install meson
```

### Information on your system
Cray platforms
-----
I've never used pkgconf so I'm not sure if it's as easy as adding the same fix. If it is then we can make a quick fix.
title: pkgconf doesn't work on Crays
